reapack.name: jer_gameaudio-workflow-regions-from-items.lua
reapack.desc: Creates empty items and regions from selected items blocks. The parent track is set in region render matrix. If you have more folders inside the main parent track, it is recommended to select the main parent track before running the script.

reapack.name: jer_insert-silence-random.lua
reapack.desc: Insert silence between items with random length between min and max value

reapack.name: jer_insert-silence.lua
reapack.desc: Insert silence between items, can be a negative value as well.

reapack.name: jer_seamless-loop.lua
reapack.desc: creates seamless loop from selected item
